alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 6:03PM MST until March 03 at 8:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches on the foothills up to Marias Pass, with another 4 to 8 inches possible above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow will reduce visibility at times, and snow drifts may make some roads impassable.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
